Text.Value: Run when they... shriek. They call... for others...
You met gnolls? How did you survive?
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
Teacher... friend... everything to me. But gnolls... ripped her... apart...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
To perform there... to sing... for Lihala...
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Synopsis: Speak with dead with Alfira. She's a bard who can perform a song in the grove. She is quiet and determined.
